title: How to Change the Payment Method on Spotify: Quick Tips

steps.title: Log into Spotify website in a web browser.
steps.content: Log into Spotify website in a web browser. You can use a desktop or mobile browser. Make sure you use the correct email address or username and password. [1] X Research source When to use this method: if you want to change the debit card, credit card, or payment account used for your Spotify membership. You can't change billing details within the Spotify app .

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Click Account.
steps.content: Click Account . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Update card.
steps.content: Click Update card . This is on the right side of your current plan. If you don't see this option, you may have a Spotify membership with your phone provider or internet provider. In this case, log into the provider website to manage your payments.

steps.title: Enter a new payment method.
steps.content: Enter a new payment method. You'll need to provide your billing address with the street, city, state, and ZIP code. Select Credit or debit card or PayPal . If you select PayPal , you'll be redirected to the official website to sign in.

steps.title: Click Change payment details.
steps.content: Click Change payment details . This is the green button at the bottom of the page. The new payment method will be used on the next billing date.

steps.title: Log into your Spotify account page.
steps.content: Log into your Spotify account page. You must have at least one payment saved to your account if you have an active plan. When to use this method: if you want to delete any extra debit card, credit card, or payment account saved to your Spotify account to ensure that it won't be used by Spotify.

steps.title: Click Saved payment cards.
steps.content: Click Saved payment cards . This will be underneath the Payment header. You may need to scroll down to find it.

steps.title: Click the card you want to remove.
steps.content: Click the card you want to remove. You'll see this under My Cards .

steps.title: Click Remove Saved Card.
steps.content: Click Remove Saved Card . The card will be removed from your account.

steps.title: Cancel your current Spotify plan.
steps.content: Cancel your current Spotify plan. Since there's no way to change your billing date manually, you'll need to end your current plan and start it again on the new day. [2] X Research source When to use this method: if you want Spotify to charge you on a different day of the month.

steps.title: Wait for the new billing date.
steps.content: Wait for the new billing date. Your Spotify account will revert back to the free version in this time period.

steps.title: Activate your plan again.
steps.content: Activate your plan again. Once activated, your new billing date will be set.
